projects.title: Lumina Brand Identity
projects.description: Brand Identity & Social Campaign. A full-scale rebranding for a sustainable lighting company, focusing on minimalist aesthetics and eco-friendly messaging.

projects.title: Urban Flow
projects.description: 15s Commercial Motion Graphic for a leading athletic wear brand. Captured the essence of city movement and high-performance gear through dynamic transitions.

projects.title: Arcadia Rebrand
projects.description: Comprehensive Brand Ecosystem including logo design, color palette, and a high-impact launch trailer.

projects.title: Echoes of Nature
projects.description: Documentary Short Film exploring the impact of urban sprawl on local ecosystems. A cinematic journey through sound and light.

projects.title: Symmetry Magazine
projects.description: Print & Digital Layout for a biannual architectural publication. Focuses on modular grids and bold typography.

projects.title: Future Pulse
projects.description: Product Launch Event Video. High-energy visuals synced with custom sound design for a futuristic tech showcase.

projects.title: Social Surge
projects.description: Instagram Grid & Story Assets for a lifestyle startup. Consistent visual language designed for maximum engagement.
